The food was fantastic!  We had read the reviews and decided to go here as it was a 1 minute walk from our hotel.  We had the menu do the day for 27€ and couldn't believe it!  Opened with a glass of champagne them bread with tomato the we had had gamba's, 6 each which could have been a meal!  I had the lamb shoulder which was the best I've ever had!!!  My wife had the sole which was delicious.  They didn't have creme brûlée tonight but will on Monday, so we have to come back!!  Ha, ha. With a bottle of wine and the extra of water our bill as 57€!  Fantastic place you have to go to if you want great food at a reasonable price.
